sen.j: 右大臣（うだいじん）とは、朝廷組織の最高機関である太政官の職の一つ。
sen.e: The Minister of the Right (udaijin) was one of the positioins in the Council of State (Daijokan), which was the highest body in the organization of the imperial court.
The Minister of the Right (udaijin) was one of the positioins in the Council of State (Daijokan), which was the highest body in the organization of the imperial court.
Udaijin was one of the positioins in Daijokan (Grand Council of State), which was the highest body in the organization of the imperial court.

sen.e: He fulfilled a support role for the Minister of the Left, and would carry out the duties of the Minister of the Left when the Minister of the left was unable to do them for some reason.
